评论概述: This is the second pair I've bought because I love them
评论详情: This is the second pair I've bought because I love them that much. I bought them to use in my manual wheelchair as I hate wearing gloves but wanted something to cover the parts of my hands that make contact with the push rims when propelling and these are great for that. I also love the study details. The only reason I bought a second pair is because I worse the first pair into the ground by using them daily for over a year. Heads up, if you wear them self propelling in a wheelchair in the rain they will warp a little bit if you've used them heavily but that's to be expected I think.  I have a few pairs of gloves I use with my wheelchair but these are the ones I always reach for. They don't give any padding but they give grip and protect my hands from friction (plus they look bad*ss)
Fit my hand perfectly. High quality leather and great style.
Good fit, nice quality, good buy.

They’re soft, comfortable and look pretty badass. You need to be gentle with these since the leather is very thin and delicate. The biggest con is that they stain your skin after a couple hours of wear and the staining isn’t easy to remove (I’m talking vigorous scrubbing with a KP body scrub).

I’ve bought several pairs, and each one is uniquely made, with finger holes varying in length and width. You never know if you’ll get a half way decent pair, or one that will forever irritate you. These simply are not made well.
I get so many compliments on these. Ordered a back up pair. High quality, and are wearing in well (6 months of wear)
Love it

I love how they fit. I also love how I can still wear my rings with my gloves! Perfect & the sizing was accurate. I believe it was a small. They look really cool on & I’ve already received some compliment's on them! Perfect if you like to wear your jewelry & your gloves. And to be able to grab my wallet & keys w/ no struggle helps a lot! I say buy the gloves. I almost didn’t & I’m really happy I did. These don’t get in the way like normal gloves & they look cooler than everyone else’s! I’m actually going to get a few more pairs. I seem to lose my favorite accessories often enough- can’t hurt.

if ur a female who rides motorcycles, scooters  etc etc these are it! they are so cute well made and are actually leather, they come with a dust bag and the sizing chart is pretty accurate make sure you measure. My hand was 8” around that’s loose and over estimating. I ordered size med which says 7.5 inches and it fit me perfectly
Not sure if it's the smell of the material but I'm not digging the remaining scent on my hands lol.
just needs padding
At work I use gloves every day. I am a L size. So I ordered a XL. And still did not fit.
Sexy good! Get them. Protects your hands but you can still see your bracelets, watch. Awesome.
These are comfortable, but a bit tight. I'm sure they just need to be broken in. I have a 7.5 hand and bought a large. So if you're between sizes, size up. These look really cool, though.
These gloves as super cute! I love them.
I have thin hands and these fit… like a glove… hard to get off though. Literally had to peel them off. But they were comfortable for all day wear and decent quality.
Hi I paired this gloves with my Gala style outfit in London. Amazing rock chic style for Red carpet!

评论概述: Supple genuine leather and great style
评论详情: This is made of supple, genuine leather and the style is great. My hands are XS in UGG gloves and can purchase a Child Medium, which is the same as women's XS: these fit exactly in all spots. It is unlined so that it is not for cold weather gear and due to its suppleness of that of lamb leather, probably would not withstand rains or snow anyways, but as a daily statement peace that acts like a second skin permiting one to perform any precise, indoor task without the feeling of having anything extra on.
They stretched out fast cause they are soft otherwise I love them

评论概述: Great fit, looks just as I was hoping.
评论详情: Really like them, especially the fact that they are real leather rather than faux.
I get compliments. Purchased to stylishly not directly touch things.
In love 😍 the leather so good and light .
Very stylish, buttery soft leather. But wish the palms had a bit of padding and the leather is paper thin.
The material is very soft and true to size. I am very happy with this purchase.

I got these to cover psoriasis on my knuckles. They don't irritate skin, fit as expected using the chart to measure size, and look cool. I can see fitting these into many outfits and would look great for going out in the evening.
Queda muy elegante y se ve de buena calidad.
fun to wear.
They definitely stand out…in a good way!

I love unique items!These are the third fingerless gloves I ordered from this company. I always get compliments on them and I also incorporate them on models in my photo shoots. Red framed signature eyeglasses and cool fingerless gloves and my museum neckpiece. So I like attention! So sue me!!!
Very soft, interesting style. I can show off my engagement ring while wearing these gloves!
These are awesome driving gloves! 🤩
Fit perfect - fantastic quality
Luv Luv Luv these gloves. Lea her is super soft, fit is perfect

As pictures, very cute and super soft. I used the sizing chart to measure my hand and they fit pretty true to size. They look distressed in my pictures only because I was wearing them for awhile before I remembered to take a picture. They are a little awkward at first to put on and take off because they do not have the full wrist length, but you get used to it and they are super comfortable when on. I purchased them for riding on my motorcycle and will update after I've gotten some miles in with them.
I didn't expect them to be so nice, but they honestly are really well made.

Diese Handschuhe sind ein Traum. Einfach in jeder Hinsicht perfekt. Passform, Material, Verarbeitung und Optik genial.
